img_text: The Boba Fett 'Star Wars' movie isn't happening The Boba Fett 'Star Wars' movie isn't happening This week Lucasfilm exec Kathleen Kennedy confirmed to reporter Erick Weber that a standalone Star Wars movie focusing on bounty hunter Boba Fett is no longer in development. While the project had never been officially announced, it was known to be a piece in the parade of anthology" movies planned in the universe.
